dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, Super Tuesday, right? What a night. Joe Biden, wow, talk about a comeback story.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, Super Tuesday, right? What a night. Joe Biden, wow, talk about a comeback story.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Joe Biden solidified his comeback in the Democratic race to defeat Donald Trump in the November election...The former vice president, whose campaign appeared to be on life support just weeks ago after a poor showing in Iowa, was resurgent across several key states...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely, Host_A. I mean, just weeks ago, people were like, is he even still in this? And then, boom, he just, like, swept up nine states.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely, Host A. I mean, just weeks ago, people were like, is he even still in this? And then, boom, he just, like, swept up nine states.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Biden wins nine states: The former vice president, whose campaign appeared to be on life support just weeks ago after a poor showing in Iowa, was resurgent across several key states...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nine states! Unbelievable. And the big one, I think everyone's still talking about, is Texas. He actually pulled that off against Bernie.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nine states! Unbelievable. And the big one, I think everyone's still talking about, is Texas. He actually pulled that off against Bernie.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...and is projected to win the key state of Texas over favourite Bernie Sanders...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, for sure. I mean, Bernie was the favorite there, and then Biden just, uh, snuck in with, what was it, a super narrow lead? Like 30% to 28.3%.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, for sure. I mean, Bernie was the favorite there, and then Biden just, uh, snuck in with, what was it, a super narrow lead? Like thirty percent to twenty eight point three percent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...is projected to win the key state of Texas over favourite Bernie Sanders, with 30% of the vote, a narrow lead over Sanders 28.3%.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Crazy. And the wild part is, he barely even campaigned in half those states he won, like Arkansas or Alabama. He was really focused on, uh, North Carolina and Virginia.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Crazy. And the wild part is, he barely even campaigned in half those states he won, like Arkansas or Alabama. He was really focused on, uh, North Carolina and Virginia.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But, Bidens victory states barely saw him on the ground in the runup to Super Tuesday: He also won in Arkansas, Alabama, Massachusetts, Oklahoma, Minnesota and Tennessee, but spent little to no time campaigning in those states, instead focusing on North Carolina and Virginia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and it really shows the power of his appeal to, you know, older voters and, um, especially black voters, which was a huge factor there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and it really shows the power of his appeal to, you know, older voters and, um, especially black voters, which was a huge factor there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He was particularly successful among black and older voters.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. On the flip side, though, let's talk about some of the, well, disappointments. Mike Bloomberg, for one. All that money spent, and, uh, no wins.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. On the flip side, though, let's talk about some of the, well, disappointments. Mike Bloomberg, for one. All that money spent, and, uh, no wins.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In contrast, Bloombergs Super Tuesday efforts fell short: The former New York Mayor failed to win any state, despite betting on Super Tuesday with the biggest spend on adverts...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's just wild, isn't it? He literally spent, like, a fortune on ads, bypassed the early debates, and then, [overlaps] uh, nothing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's just wild, isn't it? He literally spent, like, a fortune on ads, bypassed the early debates, and then, uh, nothing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...despite betting on Super Tuesday with the biggest spend on adverts, and after entering the Democratic race late and bypassing the first debates.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Right? He justâ€¦ he just fizzled out. And Elizabeth Warren too, I mean, losing in her home state of Massachusetts? That's gotta hurt.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? He just... he just fizzled out. And Elizabeth Warren too, I mean, losing in her home state of Massachusetts? That's gotta hurt.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Warren also slips away, loses in her home state: Warren's loss in Massachusetts indicates a drop in support within her core support groups...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. It really, um, makes you wonder about her core support, you know, women and liberal voters. Some people are saying she split the progressive vote.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. It really, um, makes you wonder about her core support, you know, women and liberal voters. Some people are saying she split the progressive vote.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Warren's loss in Massachusetts indicates a drop in support within her core support groups: women, liberal voters and white, college educated voters. Some have accused her of splitting the vote among progressives...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I've heard that. It's like, uh, centrist candidates, like Klobuchar and Buttigieg, they rallied around Biden, but the progressives just, like, kept going.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I've heard that. It's like, uh, centrist candidates, like Klobuchar and Buttigieg, they rallied around Biden, but the progressives just, like, kept going.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...in contrast to centrist candidates Amy Klobuchar and Pete Buttigieg who rallied round Biden at the last minute.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. But Bernie, he's not out of it entirely. He did, um, get the big one, California, didn't he? That's a huge delegate haul.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. But Bernie, he's not out of it entirely. He did, um, get the big one, California, didn't he? That's a huge delegate haul.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sanders is projected to take California: The Golden State is the plum prize, with 415 delegates on the table...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, California's massive, like 415 delegates. He also took Vermont, his home state, and, uh, Utah and Colorado.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, California's massive, like four hundred fifteen delegates. He also took Vermont, his home state, and, uh, Utah and Colorado.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Golden State is the plum prize, with 415 delegates on the table...Sanders took his home state of Vermont, as well as Utah and Colorado.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, still strong with younger and Latino voters, though, um, youth turnout was apparently even lower than 2016, which is interesting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, still strong with younger and Latino voters, though, um, youth turnout was apparently even lower than twenty sixteen, which is interesting.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sanders is more popular among Latino and younger voters, but turnout among the latter fell short, even below 2016 levels.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, very interesting. And, uh, speaking of Biden's comeback, the markets loved it, apparently. Dow Jones up like 2% on Wednesday morning.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, very interesting. And, uh, speaking of Biden's comeback, the markets loved it, apparently. Dow Jones up like two percent on Wednesday morning.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Biden's win boosted U.S. stock futures, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average rising more than 2% on Wednesday morning...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's right, a pretty clear signal there. So, I guess, um, the race is certainly heating up after Super Tuesday.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's right, a pretty clear signal there. So, I guess, um, the race is certainly heating up after Super Tuesday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. It's, uh, going to be a wild ride from here, I think.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. It's, uh, going to be a wild ride from here, I think.
